Source.Name: autotrace
Source.Summary: A program for converting bitmap to vector graphics
Source.Description: AutoTrace - a program for converting bitmap to vector graphics. The aim of the AutoTrace project is the development of a freely available application similar to CorelTrace or Adobe Streamline.

Package.Name: autotrace-devel
Package.Description: AutoTrace - a program for converting bitmap to vector graphics. The aim of the AutoTrace project is the development of a freely available application similar to CorelTrace or Adobe Streamline.
